기다리다 목이 빠지는 줄 알았다 : I almost died waiting
팔자 좋아 보이는군 : You look like you have an easy life
딱 잘라 : Say it clearly
부려 먹게 : Make use of (someone)
진짜 저질러버릴 줄은 : I didn't think he would actually go through with it
전전긍긍하는지 알겠다 : I see why he's so anxious
